data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Before entering the pool, we politely suggest that you rinse off in the shower. This ____ especially ____ for ____ of ____ who ____ been ____ our ____, ____ who ____ be ____. We strive to provide an enjoyable experience for all of our guests, and this includes providing a sanitary and hygienic swimming environment.
data.partBlankContent: Before entering the pool, we politely suggest that you rinse off in the shower. This i_ especially impo_____ for th___ of y__ who ha__ been enjo____ our g__, a__ who mi___ be swe___. We strive to provide an enjoyable experience for all of our guests, and this includes providing a sanitary and hygienic swimming environment.
data.answer: 在进入游泳池之前，我们建议您用淋浴器冲洗干净。这对那些喜欢我们的健身房，可能出汗的人来说尤其重要。我们努力为所有客人提供愉快的体验，这包括提供一个卫生和卫生的游泳环境。
